text: Babandi (indyarya) babatega iminsi, maze mwagira intsinzi iturutse kwa Allah, bakavuga bati "Ese ntitwari kumwe namwe?" Nyamara iyo abahakanyi batsinze, barababwira bati "Ese ntitwabateye ingabo mu bitugu tukanabarinda abemera?" Allah azabakiranura ku munsi wâ€™imperuka, kandi Allah ntazigera aha abahakanyi ubushobozi bwo gutsinda abemera
